alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Schenectady; Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Saratoga; Northern Warren; Schoharie; Southeast Warren; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 07 at 3:20PM EST until January 07 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of up to around one inch are expected through this evening. Storm total accumulations of 6 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts near 12 inches in higher terrain regions of the Southwest Adirondacks and Southern Greens are expected. * WHERE...Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Greater Capital Region, southern Vermont, Lake George and Saratoga Region, and the Southern Adirondacks. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow tapers to snow showers this evening before coming to an end early tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
